## filePathSegment() function

serialize a file path segment for the NamedInformationURI. i.e. strip off 'ni:///'

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function filePathSegment(ni: INamedInformationURI, options: {
    contentType: boolean;
}): string;
```
